bt.model

Class BTBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.model.BTBehavior
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BTBehaviorGuard, BTBehaviorSelection, BTBehaviorStateRealisation

    public class BTBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
    BT Behavior defines the behavior of Node.
    behavior name is the statement of the behavior
    behavior type is the BTType. If the type is difference and name is same, then it will be executed differently.
    reference number is the reference number of the behavior that is defined previously in Component
    Author:
    agung
